Description.Text: Drinks and M&S food available to buy on flights to/from London Heathrow and London Gatwick
Access to British Airways lounges where available
Complimentary bar service including champagne upon request
Contoured leather seat with guaranteed window or aisle

Description.Text: Allocated seats or pay to choose anytime
